name: Curo
long_description:
Curo helps electric fleets park and charge their vehicles anywhere with the worldâ€™s largest private network of underutilized EV charging sites. We increase revenue by 5x for EV charger owners and enable instant fleet electrification at a fraction of the cost. 

Owners of EV chargers get <10% utilization after paying hundreds of thousands of dollars to install, and distributed fleets are rapidly trying to electrify yet charging is a huge bottleneck. Curo is a Virtual Depot platform enabling fleets to long-term lease underutilized EV chargers from owners.

We're live across CA, NY and WA and have grown 100% MoM for the past 4 months. Curo is already backed by investors like Blue Bear, Not Boring, Slow and Eniac.
one_liner: Electric fleets park and charge anywhere with Curo
